This is the website for an Ohio State University workshop on Amplicon Metabarcoding,
held from March 13-15, 2024 in Wooster, Ohio.

This workshop is co-organized by:

- [Dr. Soledad Benitez-Ponce](mailto:benitezponce.1@osu.edu), [Dept. of Plant Pathology](https://plantpath.osu.edu) ([Personal website](https://u.osu.edu/benitezponce-1))
- [Dr. Timothy Frey](mailto:frey.146@osu.edu), [Dept. of Plant Pathology](https://plantpath.osu.edu)
- [Fiama Guevara](mailto:guevaraguillen.1@buckeyemail.osu.edu), [Dept. of Plant Pathology](https://plantpath.osu.edu)
- [Melanie Medina Lopez](mailto:medinalopez.2@buckeyemail.osu.edu), [Dept. of Plant Pathology](https://plantpath.osu.edu)
- [Dr. Jelmer Poelstra](mailto:poelstra.1@osu.edu), [Molecular and Cellular Imaging Center (MCIC)](https://mcic.osu.edu)
